document.full_text: sergio garcia charged into a share of the early lead in the first round of the byron nelson championship on thursday just three days after pulling out of a british open qualifier with a finger injury.
document.title: garcia shrugs off finger injury to share byron nelson lead
lines_and_colors: sergio garcia charged into a share of the early lead in the first round of the byron nelson championship on thursday just three days after pulling out of a british open qualifier with a finger injury.
